message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, Bob!
Take the low offer, Alice, or we'll have to negotiate further!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, Bob. Take it or leave it!
You're getting desperate, Alice. Better take this!
I'm not getting desperate yet, Bob! I'll give you a slightly better deal. Don't expect it to last!
You're not giving me enough, Alice. I'm starting to get impatient!
I'm not backing down, Bob! I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think I'm getting desperate yet!
You're not giving me enough, Alice. I'm starting to think I'll walk away with nothing if I don't get a better deal!
I'm not going to give in to your threats, Bob. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think I'm getting desperate!
This is my final offer, Alice. Take it or leave it. I'm not going to make another move!
I'm not going to accept your ultimatum, Bob. I'll give you one last chance to make a better offer. Don't blow it!
This is my last and final offer, Alice. I'm not going to make another move. Take it or walk away with nothing!
